meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of spermatozoa.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the spermatozoal behavior under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The spermatozoal cells were carefully examined for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The spermatozoal race to fertilize the egg was quite competitive.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as swift and focused as a spermatozoal journey.
meanings.sent5: The spermatozoal characteristics were crucial for successful reproduction.

meanings.sent1: The doctor analyzed the spermatozoal sample for fertility testing.
meanings.sent2: The spermatozoal fluid was collected for further analysis.
meanings.sent3: The spermatozoal party in the petri dish seemed quite lively.
meanings.sent4: The ocean was a vast, spermatozoal sea of life.
meanings.sent5: The spermatozoal content of the specimen was carefully preserved.
